vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
τυρβ-άζω,
trouble, stir up, τὸν πηλὸν ὥσπερ ἀτταγᾶς τυρβάσεις βαδίζων [Refs 5th c.BC+] —passive, πολὺς δὲ πηλὸς ἐκ πίθων τυρβάζεται bursts in turbid stream from.., [Refs]jostle against.., [Refs 5th c.BC+]; τ. περὶ πολλά (variant for{θορυβάζῃ}) to be troubled about.., [NT]
__II revel, enjoy oneself, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to be upset, distracted
to be troubled, disturbed, upset Lk. 10:41*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: estar preocupado, estar perturbado ; afanarse, preocuparse (LUC.10:41 - algunos manuscritos)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: gây rối loạn; bối rối; kích động hoặc làm phiền trong tâm trí
